update.title: We Have Apps!
update.content: We are a local band from Lancaster PA.Today we now have two apps, one for iPhones and another for Android! This first iteration is bare bones, but rest assured there will be great improvements in the future!

update.title: New Updates!
update.content: New updates to the Android app have been pushed! We are excited to get this new design into the Apple store and will keep you up to date!
